SEARCH
Package com.pizzashop.project4

Class BuildOwnController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzashop.project4.BuildOwnController
public class BuildOwnController extends Object
Controller class for the 'Build Your Own Pizza' interface This class handles user interactions for customizing a pizza with various toppings, sauces, sizes, and extra options. It provides methods to add and remove toppings, select sauce and size, and manage the pizza order.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainMenuController controller)
      Sets the main menu controller for this controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main menu controller to be set.

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)
      Sets the order associated with this pizza building session.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be set.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, setting up the user interface and default values. This method configures the initial settings of the components and sets up event handlers.

    • setUpUI

      private void setUpUI()
      Sets up the initial user interface components and their respective event handlers. This method initializes the lists for toppings, configures actions for menu items, and sets up listeners for sauce selection and other changes.

    • handleMenuItemSelect

      private void handleMenuItemSelect(javafx.scene.control.MenuItem menuItem)
      Handles the selection of a size from the size menu. When a menu item for size is selected, this method updates the displayed size on the menu button.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - The menu item representing the selected size.

    • capitalize

      public static String capitalize(String input)
      Converts a string to capitalized format. This utility method capitalizes the first letter of the input string.
      Parameters:
      input - The string to be capitalized.
      Returns:
      The capitalized string.

    • handleAddTopping

      private void handleAddTopping()
      Handles the action of adding a topping to the pizza. This method is triggered when the 'Add' button is clicked. It updates the pizza and price accordingly.

    • handleRemoveTopping

      private void handleRemoveTopping()
      Handles the action of removing a topping from the pizza. This method is triggered when the 'Remove' button is clicked. It updates the pizza and price accordingly.

    • handleSauce

      private void handleSauce()
      Handles the selection of sauce type for the pizza. This method is triggered when a sauce option is selected and updates the pizza's sauce accordingly.

    • handleExtraSelect

      private void handleExtraSelect()
      Handles the selection of extra cheese or extra sauce. This method is triggered when the extra cheese or extra sauce checkboxes are toggled.

    • handlePriceChange

      private void handlePriceChange()
      Updates the price display based on the current configuration of the pizza. This method recalculates and updates the price display whenever changes are made to the pizza.

    • emptySelectedToppings

      private void emptySelectedToppings()
      Clears the selected toppings list. This method moves all items from the selected toppings list back to the additional toppings list.

    • handleAddToOrder

      private void handleAddToOrder()
      Adds the configured pizza to the order. This method is called when the user finalizes their pizza customization and adds it to their order.

    • handleSizeChange

      private void handleSizeChange(Size newSize)
      Handles changes in pizza size. This method updates the pizza size and recalculates the price when a different size is selected.
      Parameters:
      newSize - The new size selected for the pizza.
